thread.title: High-flying Ghanaian winger Enoch Ebo Andoh scores debut league goal for Port Vale
thread.title_full: High-flying Ghanaian winger Enoch Ebo Andoh scores debut league goal for Port Vale

title: High-flying Ghanaian winger Enoch Ebo Andoh scores debut league goal for Port Vale
text:
Sports News | 18 October 2015 02:25 CET High-flying Ghanaian winger Enoch Ebo Andoh scores debut league goal for Port Vale - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ebo Andoh 
Ghanaian winger Enoch Ebo Andoh capped an impressive performance with his debut league goal for Port Vale in their 1-1 draw with Peterborough United on Saturday. 
The 22-year-old has hogged the headlines for his consistent displays in the English third tier league. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
